title: Shehbaz focused only on Lahore during PML-N regime: Ch.Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 20 (APP):Federal Minister for Science and Technology Chaudhry Fawad Hussain Monday said the Pakistan Muslim League Nawaz did nothing for improving the national institutions during its previous tenure.
Talking to a private news channel, he said former Punjab chief minister Shehbaz Sharif spent billions of rupees only on one project in Lahore which deprived the people of other areas.
He said Shehbaz Sharif instead of issuing the local bodiesâ€™ funds for the development in other areas of the province, rather he spent them on development of Lahore.
Replying to a question, the minister said artificial wheat crisis would be ended in few days.
Fawad said all political parties should play their role for betterment of the country.
